tourName: Saudi Arabia and Dubai holiday, 7 days
generalInfo:
Inclusions:
• Transportation (Private Van/Bus)
• Accommodation on a Bed & Breakfast basis
• English-speaking tour guides
• Entrance fees to museums and historical sites
• Meals as mentioned (1 Lunch & 1 Dinner in Saudi, multiple meals in Dubai)
• Snacks & refreshments
• Dubai Inclusions:
o Airport meet & assist with private transfers
o Dubai Classic Tour (Bastakia, Souks, Abra Ride)
o Desert Safari with Dune Bashing & BBQ Dinner
o Modern Dubai Tour with Burj Khalifa access
o Marina Dhow Cruise with Dinner
o All transfers in Dubai on a private basis

Exclusions:
• International and domestic flights
• Personal expenses and shopping
• Additional meals and beverages not mentioned
• Any optional tours or activities
• Travel insurance

dayInfo.description: Arrival in Riyadh • Airport pick-up and private transfer to the hotel. • Check-in and free time to relax. • Overnight stay in Riyadh. • Meals: No Meals.

Discover Riyadh • Breakfast at the hotel. • Explore Ad Diriyah, the historical heart of Saudi Arabia (established in 1446 AD). • Visit Masmak Fort, symbolizing the country’s historical rule. • Enjoy a traditional lunch at Najd Village, reflecting the rich Saudi heritage. • Explore Souk Al-Zal, famous for antiques, rare coins, and traditional items. • Return to the hotel and overnight stay in Riyadh. • Meals: Breakfast & Lunch.

Riyadh to Jeddah • Breakfast at the hotel and check-out. • Transfer to the airport for the flight to Jeddah (flight ticket not included). • Explore the Jeddah Waterfront, one of the latest world-class coastal developments. • Enjoy lunch at a local restaurant. • Discover Al Balad, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and visit its old and modern shops. • Experience an authentic traditional dinner. • Return to the hotel and overnight stay in Jeddah. • Meals: Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner.

Jeddah to Dubai • Breakfast at the hotel and check-out. • Transfer to Jeddah Airport for a flight to Dubai (flight ticket not included). • Arrival in Dubai and meet & greet with an airport representative. • Private transfer to the hotel, witnessing Dubai’s stunning skyline. • Check-in and overnight stay in Dubai. • Meals: Breakfast.

Dubai Classic Tour & Desert Safari • Breakfast at the hotel. • 09:00 AM: Meet the driver guide and start the Dubai Classic Tour: o Visit the Bastakia Area to explore Emirati culture and history. o Enjoy a scenic Abra Boat ride (Water Taxi). o Visit the Spice Souk & Gold Souk. • Return to the hotel for a short rest. • 03:00 PM: Pick-up for Desert Safari: o Experience dune bashing and enjoy the sunset in the desert. o Arrive at a Bedouin-style camp for a traditional experience. o Activities include camel riding, belly dance, Tanura, and fire dance shows. o Enjoy a BBQ dinner under the stars. • Return to the hotel and overnight stay in Dubai. • Meals: Breakfast & BBQ Dinner.

Dubai Modern Tour & Marina Dhow Cruise • Breakfast at the hotel. • 09:00 AM: Start the Dubai Modern Tour: o Explore Dubai Marina, a vibrant waterfront district. o Photo stops at Ain Dubai, Bluewaters Island, and Atlantis The Palm. o Visit the Souk Madinat Jumeirah for traditional shopping. o Take a picture with the iconic Burj Al Arab. o Visit Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa 124th & 125th floor (non-prime time). o Free time for shopping at Dubai Mall. • 07:30 PM: Evening transfer to Dubai Marina. • Enjoy a Marina Dhow Cruise Dinner, admiring Dubai’s skyline. • Return to the hotel and overnight stay in Dubai. • Meals: Breakfast & Dinner.
Departure from Dubai • Breakfast at the hotel. • Check-out and transfer to Dubai International Airport for departure. • Meals: Breakfast.
